name: estimate-repo
description: Git repository work hour estimation tool

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:linux
scripts.build:linux: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --public --compress GZip --output dist/estimate-repo-linux
scripts.build:macos: npm run clean && npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --public --compress GZip --output dist/estimate-repo-macos
scripts.build:windows: npm run clean && npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --public --compress GZip --output dist/estimate-repo-windows.exe
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-win-x64 --public --compress GZip --out-path dist

author: galacticai
